General.Name: Sovereign Lithium Inc
General.Description: Sovereign Lithium, Inc. focuses on the exploration and development of mineral properties primarily in the United States. The company was formerly known as Great American Energy, Inc. and changed its name to Sovereign Lithium, Inc. on July 2013. Sovereign Lithium, Inc. is based in Denver, Colorado.

0.Name: Mr. Felipe  Pimienta Barrios
0.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres, Chief Financial Officer, Sec. and Director
